text: (aṉṟiyum,) avarkaḷ perumai aṭittavarkaḷāka pūmiyil tīmaikaḷaic ceyyavum cūḻcci ceytārkaḷ. Āṉāl tīmaikaḷ ceyvataṟkāṉa cūḻcci a(c cūḻcci) ceyta)varkaḷait tavira vēṟevaraiyum cūḻntu koḷḷātu ivarkaḷukku muṉ ceṉṟōr (iṟaivaṉukku māṟu ceytu taṇṭaṉai peṟṟa) vaḻiyait tāṉ ivarkaḷum etir pārkkiṉṟaṉarā? Appaṭiyāyiṉ allāhviṉ avvaḻiyil (atāvatu, pāvam ceytōr taṇṭaṉai peṟutalil) yātoru māṟṟattaiyum nīr kāṇamāṭṭīr allāhviṉ (av) vaḻiyil tirupputalaiyum nīr kāṇamāṭṭīr
